Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First the user wants me to generate a list of targeted open ended questions based on the long process description of a property management companys onboarding process The questions should focus on Uncovering missing details Understanding decision criteria Clarifying roles and responsibilities Verifying timing and sequencing Learning about how exceptions are handled

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Importantly the questions should not involve SQL queries or implementation details They need to be conceptual aimed at deepening understanding

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Key elements from the process description 1 Initial Contact and Documentation Review Landlord contacts coordinator reviews documents 2 Recording Property Details Entering into database 3 Assigning Property Manager Based on workload specialization experience etc 4 Introductory Meeting Between manager and landlord 5 Property Inspection and Photography Scheduling and handling results 6 Marketing Creating listings brochures updating pricing 7 Activating Property Making it available for tenants 8 Tenant Screening and Selection Reviewing applications checks negotiations 9 Finalizing Lease Agreement deposit move in 10 Quality Checks and Audits Compliance financial IT 11 Overall Decision points stakeholders exceptions communication

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: I need to create open ended questions that probe these areas without being yes no Open ended questions start with words like what how why describe explain etc

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Structure the questions around the specified goals Missing Details What steps might be overlooked in the description Eg how documents are verified what specific data is entered Decision Criteria Especially for assigning managers selecting tenants handling inspections Roles and Responsibilities Who does what Eg what exactly does the property coordinator do Timing and Sequencing How long each step takes dependencies between steps Exceptions Handling How they deal with missing documents failed inspections etc

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: Aim for a list of questions probably 8 12 to cover the process comprehensively without overwhelming

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Make sure questions are neutral and focused on clarification

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Possible questions 1 For documentation review Can you describe in more detail how the property coordinator verifies the landlords documentation 2 For assigning manager What specific factors do you consider when assigning a property manager and how do you weigh them 3 For introductory meeting What topics are typically covered in the introductory call or meeting with the landlord 4 For inspection How do you prioritize addressing issues found during the inspection 5 For marketing What steps does the digital marketing team take to ensure the property is marketed effectively 6 For tenant screening Can you walk me through the criteria used for tenant screening and how decisions are made if there are multiple applicants 7 For exceptions How are exceptions such as properties requiring special insurance handled in the process 8 For timing What is the typical timeline for the entire onboarding process and are there any critical paths or bottlenecks 9 For roles Could you clarify the responsibilities of the property manager versus the leasing agent 10 For audits What kinds of internal audits are performed and who is involved in those reviews

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Ensure the questions are phrased to the interviewee like Can you tell me or How does your team

Name: Deductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Finally compile them into a numbered list
